amendment.description: Amendment sought to require each drilling permit application to include an estimate of how much the price of gasoline will decrease as a result of any oil or gas found under the permit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part C of House Report 112-616 to require each drilling permit application to include an estimate of how much the price of gasoline will decrease as a result of any oil or gas found under the permit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 266 (Roll no. 508).
